Reviews.Title: False information in the brief introduction, plz correct it!
Reviews.Author: Zhen S.
Reviews.Content: In the brief introduction, it says "32 GB Flash Memory, " then in the detailed information it says "Flash Memory Size 16", in the form it says "Storage Information not provided". The seller either did this on purpose or lack of profession. Tell you what, the memory is actually JUST 16GB. Really need to be aware of this very important information, if you want to save more in the pad other than a miniSD card.

Reviews.Title: Style and performance matches other tablets.
Reviews.Author: TERRENCE KEMBLE
Reviews.Content: I like the style, ergonomics, and performance of this tablet. Matches other tablet CPU and only cost $349. Buy with confidence.
